content: ***hello and welcome to anna s stories-the next chapter of anna s tales *** as you may know my ** anna s tales cal 1 ** was a huge success and the amount of positive feedback i got encouraged me to create something bigger but similar to the original pattern at the end of the cal so many of you were asking if there s a chance to create blocks mainly using part 1 from the pattern and join them together to make it larger i told you it s possible but i wanted to create the pattern myself with a beautifully textured border which fits the design so after months and months of waiting here it is the pattern is **free on my blog here 2 ** or if you click on visit pattern website above it is available to download for a small fee as a photo tutorial and it has a print friendly version too also there s a separate pdf file for all of the abbreviations and special stitches used **this is a written pattern and a photo tutorial only with no chart** **difficulty ** ***intermediate *** although this is an intermediate/advanced pattern advanced beginners can join in too as the pattern has clear and easy to understand instructions with a full step-by step **photo tutorial** **finished size ** *the full blanket * 47 5 x 65 / 121 x 165 cm after blocking *each block * 15 x 15 / 38 x 38 cm after blocking **materials needed ** 3 5 mm e size hook **note if you crochet loosely i advise you to use a 3 mm 5/0 size hook** ***4 scheepjes whirls and 2 whirlettes*** in the following shades and quantities o whirls 1 x sherbet rainbow 768 1 x cotton candyman 760 1 x jumpin jelly 759 1 x popin candy 762 o whirlettes 2 x ice 860 or approximately 5121 yards/ 4682 5 meters of fingering weight yarn yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers optional ***note blocking is essential to enhance the lacy textured patternwork of your blanket*** **gauge ** 5 half_double_crochet stitches and 3 row = 1″ / 2 5cm the finished size will also differ if you have a loose or tight gauge **us terms** used throughout **facebook group ** feel free to join my facebook group where you can get some extra support from me and some other wonderful members of the team you can join here https //www facebook com/groups/975632939436008/ ref=share **special thanks for my testers for their help ** *cheryl freeman gina brophy abi wilson suzanne long* thank you so much for your time to
